name: Passages of Time
description:
------------------------------

Content Warning: Suicide (seriously its like one of the main themes)

------------------------------

Text-based narrative rogue-like. Fancy way of saying its like Oregon trail or Death Road to Canada if the lead designer was using Unity as a cheaper alternative to therapy.

Set in the world of 1984 for very important thematic reasons I promise.

Escape this goddamn desert.

------------------------------

Other Influences:

   Desert by Anonymous

   No Hope, No Future: Let the Adventures Begin! by Flower Bomb

   Pathologic 2 by Ice-Pick Lodge

   Centricide 7 by Jreg

   My Dad by My Grandparents
